name: G.L. MARKS CONTRACTING, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, Appellee

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM:
AND NOW, this 26 th day of March, 1999, the order of the Commonwealth Court is AFFIRMED. Glenn Johnston, Inc. v. Com., Dept. of Revenue, — Pa. —, 726 A.2d 384 (1999).
opinions.author: PER CURIAM:

725 A.2d 756
G.L. MARKS CONTRACTING, INC., Appellant, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, DEPARTMENT OF REVENUE, Appellee.

March 26, 1999.
